name: donor
description: The collection of data elements related to a specific donor in a specific ICGC-ARGO program.

fields.name: program_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the ARGO program.
Unique identifier of the donor, assigned by the data provider.
fields.name: submitter_donor_id

fields.description: Donors last known state of living or deceased.
fields.name: vital_status

fields.description: Interval of how long the donor has survived since primary diagnosis, in days.
fields.name: survival_time

fields.description: ICD-10 diagnostic code for type of cancer in a prior malignancy.
fields.name: cancer_type_prior_malignancy

fields.description: If patient has history of prior malignancy, indicate age at previous diagnosis, in years.
fields.name: age_at_prior_malignancy

fields.description: If patient has history of prior malignancy, indicate laterality of previous diagnosis.
fields.name: laterality_of_prior_malignancy

fields.description: Indicate the menopause status of the patient at the time of primary diagnosis.
fields.name: menopause_status

fields.description: Indicate the age of menarche, the first occurrence of menstruation.
fields.name: age_at_menarche

fields.description: Indicate the number of pregnancies patient has had.
fields.name: number_of_pregnancies

fields.description: Indicate the number of children the patient gave birth to.
fields.name: number_of_children
